item.description:
Buca di Beppo on Route 9 ( across from White City Plaza in Worcester) if nice we can try for eating on the deck? need to know by Thursday so I can call for reservations....this is a great place for wine and dine!

http://www.bucadibeppo.com/

Ask for the Meetup Group. They will sit us outside if it doesn't rain.

There is no specific organizer for this event, as Maureen who originally planned it came down with an inner ear infection and is unable to attend. However, you are all in good shape - have a great time!
item.name: Friday Night Dinner
